name: Welcome
tagline: whole new world of amazing content awaits
body:
### Welcome to mithraa.org.

If you reading this then you are probably looking at the early version of the home of [Mithraa.org](http://mirthraa.org). 

Welcome once again. 

Soon, pretty... soon, this site will be filled with amazing content. Content that you just, cant get enough of. Written on a wide variety of topics that will love to read and share. 

Come back soon, for amazing some content.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
